languages.text: "Милостью его, пусть это окажется правдой". {n}Голос Абеляра звучит безжизненно и глухо.{/n}
"By His grace, may this turn out to be true." {n}Abelard's voice is dull and lifeless.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Милостью его, пусть это окажется правдой". {n}Голос Абеляра звучит безжизненно и глухо.{/n}

languages.text: 「主のご加護により、これが真実となりますように」{n}アベラルドの声は鈍く、生気がない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By His grace, may this turn out to be true." {n}Abelard's voice is dull and lifeless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「主のご加護により、これが真実となりますように」{n}アベラルドの声は鈍く、生気がない。{/n}

languages.text: “帝皇保佑，愿这一切都是真的。”{n}阿贝拉德的声音闷闷的，毫无生气。{/n}
languages.original_text: "By His grace, may this turn out to be true." {n}Abelard's voice is dull and lifeless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “帝皇保佑，愿这一切都是真的。”{n}阿贝拉德的声音闷闷的，毫无生气。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Por Su gracia, que resulte ser verdad». {n}La voz de Abelard suena apagada y sin vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By His grace, may this turn out to be true." {n}Abelard's voice is dull and lifeless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Por Su gracia, que resulte ser verdad». {n}La voz de Abelard suena apagada y sin vida.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Möge das durch seine Gnade wahr sein." {n}Abelards Stimme ist dumpf und leblos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By His grace, may this turn out to be true." {n}Abelard's voice is dull and lifeless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Möge das durch seine Gnade wahr sein." {n}Abelards Stimme ist dumpf und leblos.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je prie l'Empereur pour que ce soit vrai, » {n}murmure Abélard, comme éteint.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By His grace, may this turn out to be true." {n}Abelard's voice is dull and lifeless.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je prie l'Empereur pour que ce soit vrai, » {n}murmure Abélard, comme éteint.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "O'nun lütfuyla gerçek olsun." {n}Abelard'ın sesi, donuk ve cansız çıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "By His grace, may this turn out to be true." {n}Abelard's voice is dull and lifeless.{/n}
